about_the_game:
Once, a certain girl had a dream. Who's to blame she grew up so demanding? Who's to blame she was denied?
Once, a certain young man had a dream. He dug deeper and woke something up. But that's a whole another story of the past to read in the future.
Once, a certain clone remembered a dream that was long forgotten by his original. Now he has some windmills to battle.


Don Quixotes of Tomorrow takes place during the events of the Soul Box and gives a deeper insight on the past and the present of the main characters of the game. You can play it separately from the main menu or choose to explore the full seamlessly joined story (main game plus dlc) with the New Game + feature.

DLC features:
- new locations;
- new characters;
- addition to the amazing soundtrack;
- some hints to the other installments of the Mirror Universe.

name: The Soul Box – Don Quixotes of Tomorrow

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 1.80 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL or DirectX Compatible Graphics Card (512 MB)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 3.10 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL or DirectX Compatible Graphics Card (1024 MB)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any

short_description: An (in)side story that sheds some light on El Capitan's past and the others' present.
